alert.note: Alert for Jones (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued May 23 at 9:29PM CDT until May 23 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN JONES COUNTY... At 929 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Funston, or near Hawley, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... Abilene around 935 PM CDT. Hawley around 955 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Hodges and Lake Fort Phantom Hill. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
